xml:
Oral solution
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 1 (paediatric solution only) - Warning: This medicine may make you sleepy

Label 19 (solution other than paediatric only) - Warning: This medicine makes you sleepy. If you still feel sleepy the next day, do not drive or use tools or machines. Do not drink alcohol

Label 27 - Take with a full glass of water

Welldorm elixir
